rukus.text: Ya 'Ayyuha Ar-Rusulu Kulu Mina At-Tayyibati Wa A`malu Salihaan 'Inni Bima Ta`maluna `Alimun
Wa 'Inna Hadhihi 'Ummatukum 'Ummatan Wahidatan Wa 'Ana Rabbukum Fa Attaquni
Fataqatta`u 'Amrahum Baynahum Zuburaan Kullu Hizbin Bima Ladayhim Farihuna
Fadharhum Fi Ghamratihim Hatta Hinin
Ayahsabuna 'Annama Numidduhum Bihi Min Malin Wa Banina
Nusari`u Lahum Fi Al-Khayrati Bal La Yash`uruna
Inna Al-Ladhina Hum Min Khashyati Rabbihim Mushfiquna
Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Bi'ayati Rabbihim Yu'uminuna
Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Birabbihim La Yushrikuna
Wa Al-Ladhina Yu'utuna Ma 'Ataw Wa Qulubuhum Wa Jilatun 'Annahum 'Ila Rabbihim Raji`una
Ula'ika Yusari`una Fi Al-Khayrati Wa Hum Laha Sabiquna
Wa La Nukallifu Nafsaan 'Illa Wus`aha Wa Ladayna Kitabun Yantiqu Bil-Haqqi Wa Hum La Yuzlamun
Bal Qulubuhum Fi Ghamratin Min Hadha Wa Lahum 'A`malun Min Duni Dhalika Hum Laha `Amiluna
Hatta 'Idha 'Akhadhna Mutrafihim Bil-`Adhabi 'Idha Hum Yaj'aruna
La Taj'aru Al-Yawma 'Innakum Minna La Tunsaruna
Qad Kanat 'Ayati Tutla `Alaykum Fakuntum `Ala 'A`qabikum Tankisuna
Mustakbirina Bihi Samiraan Tahjuruna
Afalam Yaddabbaru Al-Qawla 'Am Ja'ahum Ma Lam Ya'ti 'Aba'ahumu Al-'Awwalina
Am Lam Ya`rifu Rasulahum Fahum Lahu Munkiruna
Am Yaquluna Bihi Jinnatun Bal Ja'ahum Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Aktharuhum Lilhaqqi Karihuna
Wa Lawi Attaba`a Al-Haqqu 'Ahwa'ahum Lafasadati As-Samawatu Wa Al-'Arđu Wa Man Fihinna Bal 'Ataynahum Bidhikrihim Fahum `An Dhikrihim Mu`riđuna
Am Tas'aluhum Kharjaan Fakharaju Rabbika Khayrun Wa Huwa Khayru Ar-Raziqina
Wa 'Innaka Latad`uhum 'Ila Siratin Mustaqimin
Wa 'Inna Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati `Ani As-Sirati Lanakibuna
Wa Law Rahimnahum Wa Kashafna Ma Bihim Min Đurrin Lalajju Fi Tughyanihim Ya`mahuna
Wa Laqad 'Akhadhnahum Bil-`Adhabi Fama Astakanu Lirabbihim Wa Ma Yatađarra`una
Hatta 'Idha Fatahna `Alayhim Babaan Dha `Adhabin Shadidin 'Idha Hum Fihi Mublisuna
